name: CreateFastlyService
description:
Create a Fastly service for a specific account in Datadog.

Use this tool to create a Fastly service associated with a given account within Datadog. Ideal when setting up or expanding Fastly integrations.

parameters.name: fastly_account_id
parameters.description: Provide the Fastly Account ID to create the service under.

parameters.name: fastly_service_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Fastly service to create. Provide a valid Fastly service ID.

value_schema.description: The ID of the Fastly service.

parameters.name: jsonapi_type_for_fastly_service
parameters.description: The JSON:API type, always set to 'fastly-services', for creating a Fastly service.

value_schema.description: The JSON:API type for this API. Should always be `fastly-services`.

parameters.name: fastly_service_tags
parameters.description: A list of tags for the Fastly service to help categorize and organize the service.

value_schema.description: A list of tags for the Fastly service.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: data.attributes.tags
parameters.description: A list of tags for the Fastly service.

value_schema.description: A list of tags for the Fastly service.

parameters.name: data.id
parameters.description: The ID of the Fastly service.

value_schema.description: The ID of the Fastly service.

parameters.name: data.type
parameters.description: The JSON:API type for this API. Should always be `fastly-services`.

value_schema.description: The JSON:API type for this API. Should always be `fastly-services`.
